entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
